hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Bombs (5 pieces)# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #0# major items.

GC (Medigoron).text: Why are they called Wallmasters if they come from the ceiling?

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that deep #under a vast lake#, one can find #the Forest Temple#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #a Red Rupee#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: For you, the day you read this hint was the most important day of your life.^But for me, it was Tuesday.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Blue Rupee#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #the Bottom of the Well#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #Cojiro#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Thieves' Hideout# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that plundering #Lake Hylia# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #the Key#.
